import React,{useContext} from 'react' import './TopProfile.css' import { Tooltip } from '@material-ui/core' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {Context} from '../context/Context' const TopProfile = ({ topProfile }) => { const publicFolder = "http://localhost:5000/Images/" const pic = publicFolder + topProfile.photo; const {user,dispatch}=useContext(Context); c return ( <>
{topProfile.userName}
{topProfile.postCount} Posts
{topProfile.friendsCount} Friends
) } export default TopProfile;
